name: Mental Immunity Training
description: Developing mental resilience to withstand psychological attacks and emotional manipulation.

cards.title: Developing Cognitive Armor
cards.description: Creating mental defenses against psychological attacks.
bulletpoints: Regularly exposing yourself to controlled stress builds resilience against real-world manipulation.
Rehearsing mental counter-scripts helps prevent emotional hijacking by PSNs.
Practicing skepticism allows you to detect and reject manipulative narratives before they take hold.
cards.summaryText: Train under controlled pressure to build real-world resistance, drill mental comebacks so hijacking attempts bounce off, and sharpen skepticism into a reflex that catches manipulation before it roots.

cards.title: Emotional Resilience Against Manipulation
cards.description: Training your emotions to remain unaffected by PSN tactics.
bulletpoints: Recognizing and detaching from emotional baiting prevents PSNs from exploiting reactions.
Reframing negative experiences into learning opportunities enhances long-term resistance.
Practicing mindfulness reduces impulsive reactions to manipulative psychological triggers.
cards.summaryText: Spot bait and disengage before they can hook your emotions, turn every bad experience into a lesson that toughens you up, and use mindfulness to slow reactions so triggers misfire.

cards.title: The Power of Self-Validation
cards.description: Becoming psychologically self-sufficient to eliminate dependence on external validation.
bulletpoints: Cultivating self-trust ensures external opinions do not dictate your self-worth.
Developing a personal code of ethics creates an unshakable internal compass.
Mastering the ability to self-assess negates the influence of PSN gaslighting tactics.
cards.summaryText: Build self-trust so deep that outside voices can't touch your worth, forge a personal ethics code that no one can bend, and perfect self-assessment to render gaslighting powerless.
